Draco.name: Draco
Draco.bio: Hey. I’m Draco, the project manager for Neo Pyrite and the person who put together this very website. You could say I’m the most mild-mannered member of the team though that’d definitely be a lie. I started playing Splatoon competitively around the beginning of last year, but I dabbled in games like Pokémon Unite and Super Smash Bros before that. Other than that, I’m a big fan of RPGs of all sorts and love reading manga. I'm really glad that I'm able to work on this project with The Fools and I can't wait to see what we whip up going forward.
Draco.quote: my least favorite part about being on a splatoon team is playing splatoon
